column1: 1. Update Account Size in cell B1 as you add capital
2. Set your Risk Per Trade % in cell D1 (recommend 0.5-1.0%)
3. For each new trade fill in: Date Symbol Entry Stop Target
4. Formula for Shares = (Account Size × Risk%) / (Entry - Stop) rounded down
5. Track Status: OPEN CLOSED WIN LOSS
6. Update Exit Price and Actual P/L when closed
7. Keep total Risk $ across open positions under Max Total Risk %
- $2000 account × 1% risk = $20 max risk per trade
- With 5 positions max at 1% each = 5% total risk max
- Never exceed 5% total portfolio risk with all open positions combined
